content: I'm interested in a feature for futures-rs, a struct with an API similar to SelectAll but that allows users to insert, remove, and modify streams by a key at runtime. Would anyone mind directing me to the place I ought to ask pre-RFC questions about that?
futures-rs is a separate crate, not part of the language, so you don't need an RFC for changes
I'm not sure where to ask but I bet there instructions on the GitHub repo
I see, thank you. That explains why I couldn't find the channel for it lol.
